name: Basic load/store
code:
addi x1,x0,10
addi x2,x0,10

addi x3,x0,20
sw x1,0(x3)
sw x2,0(x3)

addi x4,x0,20
lw x5,0(x4)
lw x6,0(x4)

name: Simple loop
code:
addi x3, x0, 3
loop:
  beq  x3,x0,loopEnd
  subi x3,x3,1
  jal  x0,loop
loopEnd:

name: Bubble sort
Loop unrolling
Store to array
Divide by zero
AXPY
